node.display_long_description:
RPG fans, it’s time to unite…in VR! Now available with the second adventure, Realm of the Rat King. 

Do you have the mettle to survive a monster-infested dungeon crawler that immerses players in the classic fantasy RPG genre like never before? Time to find out!

Terrors and treasure await as you and your band of warriors brave the corrupted catacombs of ‘The Black Sarcophagus’ (Adventure 1) and unforgiving sewers of Sunderhaven in the ‘Realm of the Rat King’ (Adventure 2) in this truly authentic tabletop experience.  

Up to four players assume the role of eagle-eyed hunter, mystical sorcerer, deadly assassin or protective guardian. But choose your champions wisely in this cooperative adventure, for once you have accepted your quest, players must work together to vanquish the unholy force that corrupts everything living in the province of Helmaar…or die trying.  

Demeo has an extensive content map planned to ensure adventurers have a steady supply of treasure and glory. Download now!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
New game update - Realm of the Rat King

Game updates:
New adventure: Realm of the Rat King is now live!
New boss: Rat King
New environment: The sewers (5 levels)
New enemies: Gorgon and Spore Fungus
New cards: Torch, Antitoxin and Web Bomb
New status effects: Berserk, Vermin Frenzy, Frenzy Target, Torch, Antitoxin and Petrified
Added an in-game news screen
Updated the drawing to appear between the thumb and index finger of the in-game hand

Skirmish mode:
Added option to choose what adventure to play
Added option to choose number of Champions to play (1-4)
Added option to select all Champions in your game
All Champions can now use the shop

General balancing updates:
Changed gold cost and rarity to several cards
Changed amount of energy gained from trashing on several cards to better reflect their gold value
Removed option to convert cards to energy while being in the shop

Assassin updates:
Bosses are now immune to Coin Flip.
Cursed Dagger no longer breaks stealth

Hunter updates:
Hunter’s Mark can no longer be stacked
Added one extra card slot to compensate for having two replenishable cards

Friendly units and enemy updates:
Added possibility to miss for Repeating Ballista, Behemoth, 
Added immunity to poison, blind and panic for Repeating Ballista, Behemoth, Healing Ward, Mini Barricade, Scrying Beacon, Lure and Proximity Mine
Added immunity to blind and panic for Rat’s Nest
Behemoth now ignites poisonous tiles

nodes.title: New Adventure: Realm of the Rat King
nodes.body_text:
The town of Sunderhaven is suffering from an unlikely infestation and is calling for your aid. Feral rats have begun to appear, and the rumors among the locals suggest that they’re being steered by someone… or something. It's time to delve deep into the sewers beneath Sunderhaven to locate the source of this mysterious scourge and eliminate it by any means necessary.

The new update includes:
- New environment: The sewers are dark and very dangerous. With endless threats lurking in the shadows, adventurers will want to stick together if they’re going to survive.
- New enemies: Spore Fungus are filled to the brim with poison, so be sure to watch your step — and don’t let the multi-headed Gorgon catch your gaze, or you might just turn to stone!
- New cards: Brighten your way with the trusty Torch card, treat any poisons with the new Antitoxin and go on the offensive with your brand new Web Bomb.
- New boss: The Rat King is the last monster you’d want to be trapped with when you’re five levels underground, but that’s exactly where you’ll find this horrifying monarch that is literally bound to his subjects.
- We've also added bug fixes and balancing tweaks to make the game experience even better.

Good luck, adventurer. You may very well need it.

Join our Discord server to find new friends to play with.
Follow us on Twitter for even more Demeo updates.

nodes.title: Realm of the Rat King Celebration Giveaway
nodes.body_text:
We're so excited for the release of Demeo's new adventure Realm of the Rat King going live next week on June 28! To celebrate we're throwing a big giveaway including an Oculus Quest 2, exclusive influencer merch boxes and more!

In order to take part, please check out the giveaway on Gleam.io!

Don't forget to join our Discord server to find other like-minded people to hang out with.
Follow us on Twitter so you don't miss out on any updates.

node.reviewDescription:
First off, this is an amazing game. It’s fun and challenging and more content Is on the way. Other reviews hit on the many positives. 

Regarding single player, these are the few suggestions I have after several hours of gameplay:

- A save game feature would be useful for solo play for those who can only play in short bursts. 
- Being able to pick the classes of the other two team members would be useful to create some replay variety. 
- Currently there doesn’t seem to be a way to get back to the main menu once you pick single player without restarting, but maybe I’m just not finding it. 

Once again, this is a fantastic game and I plan on spending many more hours playing.

website_page_meta.description:
Gather your friends and brave the underworld of Resolution Games’ RPG dungeon crawler, Demeo, now available with the second adventure, Realm of the Rat King. Download now!

Terrors and treasure await as you and up to three friends unite to combat the forces of evil and vanquish the darkness that roams the province of Helmaar in the cooperative turn-based game of Demeo.
website_page_meta.title: Demeo · Oculus Quest
